name: Sword Fighting Simulator 2k16 (Temp name)
description:
You can use an Xbox 360 Controller to play this along with the keyboard.

This prototype has some interesting mechanics, and I am looking to implement some more, which is where I need some ideas.

Mechanics:

  • Enemys can only attack to their left.
  • You're only weapon is a goomba stomp (Pirate stomp, I guess)
  • Boost Pads layed out on the floor are there because there is no jumping in this game.

Controls:

  • A+D to move. (Left thumbstick)
  • Q to spawn another enemy. (X button)
  • E to restart the level if you die. (Y button)
